LanguageData.ZeroTechClear.label: Forget everything
LanguageData.ZeroTechClear.description: Delete all zero-related memories from the conscious level, and completely forget any zero-related research.
LanguageData.ZeroTechClear.discoveredLetterText: You forget all the technology associated with Zero.
LanguageData.ZeroTechBase.label: Zero technology logic
LanguageData.ZeroTechBase.description:
The basic technology of Zero Technology seems to be just a few function problems of average difficulty, but the way of solving the problem is extremely strange, and it may be necessary to change the way of thinking to understand

The production of unlocking the cap of the zero-seed cocktail bottle
The production of the unlocking zero-seed processing table
LanguageData.ZeroTechBase.discoveredLetterText: You have successfully understood Zero's mode of thinking, and from then on a new world will unfold before your eyes, and some "non-existent" will come to this planet, and you will survive.
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseII.label: Zeroson Technology Logic II
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseII.description: A series of functions similar to the logic of Zerosub Technology, but the content is more distorted, and seems to involve some occult knowledge\n\nunununting the chain of demon communication events
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseII.discoveredLetterText: A pair of huge eyes open over your colony, and when you concentrate on observing again, you see nothing, as if something is about to come.
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseIII.label: Zeroson Technology Logic III
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseIII.description: At first glance, this technique looks like an anagram, but it cannot find the only answer, and it seems to tell the theory of the balance form of everything in the world\nununlock the chain of elemental balance events
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseIII.discoveredLetterTitle: The elements are quietly pouring in
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseIII.discoveredLetterText: You begin to feel what is around you, and you can't influence them, but you can feel their actual presence
LanguageData.ZeroTechGel.label: Basic zero sub-material
LanguageData.ZeroTechGel.description: To make a material, is there any way to get what you want without compromising existing resources? That is... Turn trash into resources!\nUnlock the crafting of the gel presser, which can convert other substances into gel\nSomething will notice you
LanguageData.ZeroTechAlloy.label: High-grade zero sub-materials
LanguageData.ZeroTechAlloy.description: If a material is too weak, try to remove the useless parts\nYou can process the gel\nSomething will pay attention to you
LanguageData.ZeroTechFlareGun.label: Signal gun
LanguageData.ZeroTechFlareGun.description: A signal gun filled with special ammunition is not to attract attention, but to make something special happen (mods required:ZeroTech-flare gun)
LanguageData.ZeroTechFlareGunEX.label: Directional signal gun
LanguageData.ZeroTechFlareGunEX.description: Random signal guns sometimes tend to lead to not so good results, so why not try controlling the energy fluctuations in the direction you want (mods required:ZeroTech-flare gun)
LanguageData.ZeroTechDrugs.label: Zero seed drugs
LanguageData.ZeroTechDrugs.description: The really terrible addiction is not that the user is physically unable to leave, but after use, it will not bring any side effects, but psychologically it is completely impossible to give up (mods are required:ZeroTech-meal and drug)
LanguageData.ZeroTechMeals.label: Zero seed cooking guide
LanguageData.ZeroTechMeals.description: Are these things really meals? Our scientists seem to be a bit self-indulgent (mods needed:ZeroTech-meal and drug)
LanguageData.ZeroTechBodyPart.label: Limb modification theory
LanguageData.ZeroTechBodyPart.description: Human physical bodies may be infinitely powerful, but if you want to gain great power in a short period of time, you may try mechanical modification (mods required:ZeroTech-bionic)
LanguageData.ZeroTechImpantMaker.label: Implant making
LanguageData.ZeroTechImpantMaker.description: Is there a limit to human existence? In that case, why don't we try to make a god~\n\nUnlock the puppet, thinking radiation chip, desire suppression chip and other implants (module required: ZeroTech-bionic)
LanguageData.ZeroTechAdv.label: Zero-child heterogeneity
LanguageData.ZeroTechAdv.description: What the hell are you doing? This is beyond the scope of science, stop what dangerous things!
LanguageData.ZeroTechAdv.discoveredLetterText: You have successfully understood Zer's mode of thinking, and from then on a new world will unfold before your eyes, and some "non-existent" will come to this planet, will you survive?
LanguageData.ZeroTechLongRandPower.label: Remote power transmission
LanguageData.ZeroTechLongRandPower.description: Don't want to see ugly generators? Don't want to trip over a cable while walking?\nSince electricity is also an energy, why not try air-transmitting power (modules required:ZeroTech-power)
LanguageData.ZeroTechThinkingPower.label: Special energy power generation
LanguageData.ZeroTechThinkingPower.description: What is the thinking of living beings? But not understanding its existence doesn't mean we can't use it, using a wave absorber to absorb the thinking of living things to get electricity (module required:ZeroTech-power)
LanguageData.ZeroTechDenfence.label: Defensive barriers and advanced traps
LanguageData.ZeroTechDenfence.description:
If the enemy can use the range advantage to strike us, then why not make a barrier that a person can pass through but a high-speed object cannot? Or why don't we try to set a net before the enemy even discovers us, directly destroying the enemy

Unlock the cell barrier and the decomposition barrier craft
Unlock gas trap and static trap production (mod required: ZeroTech-defence)
LanguageData.ZeroTechTurret.label: Defensive turrets vs. attack turrets
LanguageData.ZeroTechTurret.description: Are automatic weapons really that bad, no! That's because more often people can't make better use of the connection between energy and thought (mods are needed:ZeroTech-defence)
LanguageData.ZeroTechFalsePast.label: Abandon technology
LanguageData.ZeroTechFalsePast.description: It's a series of studies that aren't recognized by the vast majority of people, but where they don't know, these technologies are still being developed secretly
LanguageData.ZeroTechFalsePastBionic.label: Set Bionic
LanguageData.ZeroTechFalsePastBionic.description: Using the resonance effect between bionics, the bionic radiation of each piece is combined, which brings a great bonus to the installer
LanguageData.ZeroTechTruePast.label: Zero Past
LanguageData.ZeroTechTruePast.description: Some of the sealed stories of the Zero Subgroup are not all research for progress, but more about trying to destroy.
LanguageData.ZeroTechPuppetDie.label: Puppet funeral song
LanguageData.ZeroTechPuppetDie.description: They have no life, just a pile of broken iron, which is the vast majority of people's perception of machinery. However, when they begin to develop feelings and begin to be driven by the "self", then everything will change.
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseC.label: The gates of the righteous world
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseC.description: There is nothing here! (Mods required:ZeroTech-heterodox trial)
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseC.discoveredLetterTitle: The door to the world of Justice is opened
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseC.discoveredLetterText: However, it is of no use
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCI.label: See the seal of desire
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCII.label: The seal of listening
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCIII.label: The seal of Desire
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCIV.label: The seal of taste
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCV.label: The seal of Touch
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCVI.label: Willingness Seal
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCE.label: The seal of hypocrisy
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEI.label: The Seal of Ecstasy
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEII.label: The Seal of Rage
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEIII.label: The Seal of Grief
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEIV.label: The Seal of Fear
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEV.label: The Seal of Love
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEVI.label: The Seal of Disgust
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEVII.label: The Seal of Greed
LanguageData.ZeroTechBaseCEE.label: The Seal of Truth
